html:
{% macro render_invoice(copy_type) %}
{{ letter_head }}
Goods Receipt Note
Supplier Details
{{ doc.address_display }}
Invoice No. :
Invoice Date :
{{doc.name}}
{{doc.posting_date|global_date_format}}
Carrier :
Mode of Transport :
Tpt. L.R. No. & Date :
Road Permit No :
No. of Cases :
Gross Weight:
{{ doc.pr_carrier or ' ' }}
{{ doc.pr_mode_of_transport or ' '}}
{% if doc.pr_lr_no %} {{ doc.pr_lr_no + ', ' + doc.pr_lr_date|global_date_format }} {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
{{ doc.pr_road_permit_no or ' ' }}
{{ doc.pr_no_of_cases or ' ' }}
{% if doc.pr_gross_weight %} {{ doc.pr_gross_weight }} (kg) {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for tax in doc.taxes -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Code Item Description Basic Price Qty Unit Value
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }} {{ row.description }} {{row.rate}} {{row.qty}} {{row.amount}}
{{tax.description}} {{tax.tax_amount}}
Grand Total {{doc.grand_total}}
{{ doc.terms }}
The Goods are dispatched subject to your acceptance. Please acknowledge receipt of the goods
For Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited
Receiver's Signature Stamp
Regd Office: Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited, Eucharistic Congress Bldg. No. 2, 3rd Floor, 5 Convent Street, Colaba, Mumbai 400001.
{% endmacro %} {{ render_invoice("Original - Buyer's Copy") }} {{ render_invoice("Duplicate - Transporter's Copy") }} {{ render_invoice("Triplicate - Seller's Copy") }}
name: Goods Receipt Note

html:
{% macro render_invoice(copy_type) %}
{%- if doc.docstatus == 0 %}
DRAFT
{%- elif doc.docstatus == 2 %}
CANCELLED
{%- endif %}
{{ letter_head }}
Memo Invoice
Buyer Details
{{ doc.address_display }}
TIN No : {{ frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "spn_tin_no") or '' }}
CST No : {{ frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "spn_cst_no") or '' }}
Invoice No. :
Invoice Date :
{{doc.name}}
{{doc.posting_date|global_date_format}}
Carrier : {{ doc.spn_carrier or ' ' }}
Mode of Transport : {{ doc.spn_mode_of_transport or ' '}}
Tpt. L.R. No. & Date : {% if doc.spn_lr_no %} {{ doc.spn_lr_no + ', ' + doc.spn_lr_date|global_date_format }} {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
Road Permit No : {{ doc.spn_road_permit_no or ' ' }}
No. of Cases : {{ doc.spn_no_of_cases or ' ' }}
Weight of Consignment : {% if doc.spn_consignment_weight %} {{ doc.spn_consignment_weight }} (kg) {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for tax in doc.taxes -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Code Item Description Basic Price Qty Unit Value
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }} {{ row.description }} {{row.rate}} {{row.qty}} {{row.amount}}
Gross Total {{doc.total}}
{{tax.description}} {{'%0.2f' % tax.tax_amount}}
Grand Total - {{ doc.in_words }} {{ '%0.2f' % doc.grand_total}}
{{ doc.terms }}
The Goods are dispatched subject to your acceptance. Please acknowledge receipt of the goods
For Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited
Receiver's Signature Stamp
Regd Office: Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited, Eucharistic Congress Bldg. No. 2, 3rd Floor, 5 Convent Street, Colaba, Mumbai 400001.
{% endmacro %} {{ render_invoice("Original - Buyer's Copy") }} {{ render_invoice("Duplicate - Transporter's Copy") }} {{ render_invoice("Triplicate - Seller's Copy") }}
name: Memo Invoice

html:
{% macro render_invoice(copy_type) %}
{%- if doc.docstatus == 0 %}
DRAFT
{%- endif %} {%- if doc.docstatus == 2 %}
CANCELLED
{%- endif %}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- if doc.is_return == 1 %}
Sales Return
{%- endif %} {%- if doc.is_return == 0 %}
Tax Invoice
{%- endif %}
Buyer Details
{{ doc.address_display }}
TIN No : {{ frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "spn_tin_no") or '' }}
CST No : {{ frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer, "spn_cst_no") or '' }}
Invoice No. :
Invoice Date :
{{doc.name}}
{{doc.posting_date|global_date_format}}
Carrier : {{ doc.spn_carrier or ' ' }}
Mode of Transport : {{ doc.spn_mode_of_transport or ' '}}
Tpt. L.R. No. & Date : {% if doc.spn_lr_no %} {{ doc.spn_lr_no + ', ' + doc.spn_lr_date|global_date_format }} {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
Road Permit No : {{ doc.spn_road_permit_no or ' ' }}
No. of Cases : {{ doc.spn_no_of_cases or ' ' }}
Weight of Consignment : {% if doc.spn_consignment_weight %} {{ doc.spn_consignment_weight }} (kg) {% else %} {{ ' ' }} {% endif %}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.additional_discount_percentage -%} {%- endif -%} {%- for tax in doc.taxes -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Item Code Item Description Basic Price MRP Qty Unit Discount(%) Value
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }} {{ row.description }} {{ row.rate }} {{ frappe.db.get_value("Item Price", {"item_code": row.item_code, "price_list": "Standard Selling"}, "price_list_rate") }} {{row.qty}} {{row.discount_percentage if row.discount_percentage > 0 else "-"}} {{ '%0.2f' % row.amount}}
Gross Total {{ '%0.2f' % doc.total }}
{{ doc.spn_monthly_discount }} @ {{ doc.additional_discount_percentage }} % {{ doc.discount_amount }}
{{tax.description}} {{ '%0.2f' % tax.tax_amount }}
Grand Total {{ '%0.2f' % doc.grand_total }}
Rounded Total {{ ("-" + doc.in_words) if doc.in_words else "" }} {{ '%0.2f' % doc.rounded_total}}
{{ doc.terms }}
The Goods are dispatched subject to your acceptance. Please acknowledge receipt of the goods
For Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited
Receiver's Signature Stamp
Regd Office: Bellezimo Professionale Products Private Limited, Eucharistic Congress Bldg. No. 2, 3rd Floor, 5 Convent Street, Colaba, Mumbai 400001.
{% endmacro %} {{ render_invoice("Original - Buyer's Copy") }} {{ render_invoice("Duplicate - Transporter's Copy") }} {{ render_invoice("Triplicate - Seller's Copy") }}
name: SPN Sales Invoice
